class.name: giuseppe.salvi.icos.library.ICOSSeekBar
class.event: ValueChanged(Value As Int , FromUser As Boolean)
VolumeChanged(Volume As Int , FromUser As Boolean)

method.name: InitializeVolumeBar
method.comment:
You have to use this with MediaPlayer or ICOSMusicPlayer
Example: Dim ics As ICOSSeekBar
Sub Activity_Create(FirstTime As Boolean) ics.InitializeVolumeBar("ics") ics.ProgressBitmap=LoadBitmap(File.DirAssets,"somefile.png") ics.CursorBitmap=LoadBitmap(File.DirAssets,"somefile.png") Activity.AddView(ics,115,500,350,35) End Sub

method.name: InitializeProgressBar
method.comment:
Example: Dim ics As ICOSSeekBar
Sub Activity_Create(FirstTime As Boolean) ics.InitializeProgressBar("ics") Activity.AddView(ics,115,500,350,35) End Sub

method.name: InitializeSeekBar
method.comment:
Example: Dim ics As ICOSSeekBar
Sub Activity_Create(FirstTime As Boolean) ics.InitializeSeekBar("ics") ics.ProgressBitmap=LoadBitmap(File.DirAssets,"somefile.png") ics.CursorBitmap=LoadBitmap(File.DirAssets,"somefile.png") Activity.AddView(ics,115,500,350,35) End Sub

property.name: ProgressBarMax
property.comment:
This is part of InitializeProgressBar ( You'll find it in ICOSSeekBar )
Set the Max value of ProgressBarMax

property.name: Value
property.comment:
This is part of InitializeSeekBar or InitializeVolumeBar ( You'll find it in ICOSSeekBar )
return progress Value

property.name: CursorBitmap
property.comment:
This is part of InitializeSeekBar or InitializeVolumeBar ( You'll find it in ICOSSeekBar )
Example:
ics.CursorBitmap=LoadBitmap(File.DirAssets,"somefile.png")

property.name: ProgressBitmap
property.comment:
This is part of InitializeSeekBar or InitializeVolumeBar ( You'll find it in ICOSSeekBar )
Example:
ics.ProgressBitmap=LoadBitmap(File.DirAssets,"somefile.png")

property.name: StreamVolume
property.comment: return the value of Volume ( the value is between 0 to 15)

property.name: Max
property.comment:
This is part of InitializeSeekBar or InitializeVolumeBar ( You'll find it in ICOSSeekBar )
return Max Value

property.name: ProgressBarValue
property.comment:
This is part of InitializeProgressBar ( You'll find it in ICOSSeekBar)
Set the value of ProgressBarValue

property.name: Version
property.comment: Return the version of this library
